snippet: The Celtics’ Paul Pierce, 35, is considered one of the league’s stalwart and sage big-game veterans. His delayed rise might reflect the best-case career trajectory for the Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column notes that Boston Celtics forward Paul Pierce is considered among NBA’s stalwart and sage big-game veterans; observes that his delayed rise might reflect best-case career trajectory for New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony.
lead_paragraph: The Celtics’ Paul Pierce, 35, is considered one of the league’s stalwart and sage big-game veterans. His delayed rise might reflect the best-case career trajectory for the Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony.

headline.print_headline: Anthony Can Learn From Pierce’s Career Arc
headline.seo: Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony Can Learn From Paul Pierce’s Career Arc
headline.main: Anthony Can Learn From Pierce’s Career Arc
